channel.title: SIP on My Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in SIP on My Hugo

item.title: Debugging on OSX
item.description: SIP (System Integrity Protection) SIP is introduced in OS X EI Capitan. Turn it off to debug an app. Turn off SIP Note: On some old version of OSX (e.g. 10.9) extra command is required: $ sudo /usr/sbin/DevToolsSecurity --enable Password: Developer mode is now enabled.
